00008 EaglePlan* EaglePlan_New(int pageSize)
00009 {
00010     EaglePlan *plan = (EaglePlan*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePlan_New.1", sizeof(EaglePlan));
00011     if(NULL == plan) {
00012         return NULL;
00013     }
00014     
00015     plan->pageSize = pageSize;
00016     
00017     plan->allocatedOperations = 10;
00018     plan->usedOperations = 0;
00019     plan->operations = (EaglePlanOperation**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePlan_New.2", sizeof(EaglePlanOperation*), plan->allocatedOperations);
00020     if(NULL == plan->operations) {
00021         EagleMemory_Free(plan);
00022         return NULL;
00023     }
00024     
00025     plan->allocatedProviders = 10;
00026     plan->usedProviders = 0;
00027     plan->providers = (EaglePlanBufferProvider**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePlan_New.3", sizeof(EaglePlanBufferProvider*), plan->allocatedProviders);
00028     if(NULL == plan->providers) {
00029         EagleMemory_Free(plan->operations);
00030         EagleMemory_Free(plan);
00031         return NULL;
00032     }
00033     
00034     plan->errorCode = EaglePlanErrorNone;
00035     plan->errorMessage = NULL;
00036     plan->executionTime = 0;
00037     plan->lockWaitTime = 0;
00038     
00039     plan->buffersNeeded = 0;
00040     plan->bufferTypes = NULL;
00041     
00042     plan->resultFields = 0;
00043     plan->result = NULL;
00044     
00045     plan->freeObjects = EagleLinkedList_New();
00046     
00047     return plan;
00048 }

00050 void EaglePlan_addOperation(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanOperation *epo)
00051 {
00052     plan->operations[plan->usedOperations++] = epo;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void EaglePlan_addBufferProvider(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanBufferProvider *bp, EagleBoolean free)
00056 {
00057     plan->providers[plan->usedProviders++] = bp;
00058     if(EagleTrue == free) {
00059         EaglePlan_addFreeObject(plan, bp, (void(*)(void*)) EaglePlanBufferProvider_Delete);
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 void EaglePlan_addFreeObject(EaglePlan *plan, void *obj, void (*free)(void*))
00064 {
00065     EagleLinkedListItem *item = EagleLinkedListItem_New(obj, EagleTrue, free);
00066     EagleLinkedList_add(plan->freeObjects, item);
00067 }

00069 const char* EaglePlan_toString(EaglePlan *plan)
00070 {
00071     char *str, *temp = NULL;
00072     int i;
00073     
00074     if(NULL == plan) {
00075         return NULL;
00076     }
00077     
00078     str = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePlan_toString.1", 1024);
00079     if(NULL == str) {
00080         return NULL;
00081     }
00082     
00083     str[0] = 0;
00084     strcat_safe(str, "EaglePlan:\n");
00085     
00086     if(plan->usedProviders > 0) {
00087         strcat_safe(str, "  Providers:\n");
00088     }
00089     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedProviders; ++i) {
00090         strcat_safe(str, "    ");
00091         temp = EaglePlanBufferProvider_toString(plan->providers[i]);
00092         strcat_safe(str, temp);
00093         EagleMemory_Free(temp);
00094         strcat_safe(str, "\n");
00095     }
00096     
00097     if(plan->usedOperations > 0) {
00098         strcat_safe(str, "  Operations:\n");
00099     }
00100     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedOperations; ++i) {
00101         char *s = EaglePlanOperation_toString(plan->operations[i]);
00102         strcat_safe(str, "    ");
00103         strcat_safe(str, s);
00104         strcat_safe(str, "\n");
00105         EagleMemory_Free(s);
00106     }
00107     
00108     if(plan->buffersNeeded > 0) {
00109         strcat_safe(str, "  Buffers:\n");
00110     }
00111     for(i = 0; i < plan->buffersNeeded; ++i) {
00112         char *msg = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePlan_toString.2", 128), *type;
00113         if(NULL == msg) {
00114             EagleMemory_Free(str);
00115             return NULL;
00116         }
00117         
00118         type = EagleDataType_typeToName(plan->bufferTypes[i]);
00119         sprintf(msg, "    %d type=%s\n", i, type);
00120         strcat_safe(str, msg);
00121         EagleMemory_Free(type);
00122         EagleMemory_Free(msg);
00123     }
00124     
00125     return str;
00126 }

00128 void EaglePlan_Delete(EaglePlan *plan)
00129 {
00130     if(NULL == plan) {
00131         return;
00132     }
00133     
00134     EagleLinkedList_DeleteWithItems(plan->freeObjects);
00135     EagleMemory_Free(plan->result);
00136     EagleMemory_Free(plan->providers);
00137     EagleMemory_Free(plan->operations);
00138     EagleMemory_Free(plan->errorMessage);
00139     EagleMemory_Free(plan->bufferTypes);
00140     EagleMemory_Free(plan);
00141 }

00143 EaglePlanBufferProvider* EaglePlan_getBufferProviderByName(EaglePlan *plan, char *name)
00144 {
00145     int i;
00146     
00147     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedProviders; ++i) {
00148         EaglePageProvider *provider = plan->providers[i]->provider;
00149         if(NULL != provider->name && strcmp(name, provider->name) == 0) {
00150             return plan->providers[i];
00151         }
00152     }
00153     
00154     return NULL;
00155 }

00157 void EaglePlan_setError(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanError errorCode, char *errorMessage)
00158 {
00159     plan->errorCode = errorCode;
00160     plan->errorMessage = (NULL == errorMessage ? NULL : strdup(errorMessage));
00161 }
00162 
00163 EagleBoolean EaglePlan_isError(EaglePlan *plan)
00164 {
00165     if(plan->errorCode == EaglePlanErrorNone) {
00166         return EagleFalse;
00167     }
00168     return EagleTrue;
00169 }

00171 void EaglePlan_resumeTimer(EaglePlan *plan)
00172 {
00173     plan->splitTime = mach_absolute_time();
00174 }
00175 
00176 void EaglePlan_stopTimer(EaglePlan *plan)
00177 {
00178     plan->executionTime += mach_absolute_time() - plan->splitTime;
00179 }

00181 double EaglePlan_getExecutionSeconds(EaglePlan *plan)
00182 {
00183     if(0 == plan->executionTime) {
00184         return 0.0;
00185     }
00186     
00187     return (double) plan->executionTime * (double) 1.0e-9;
00188 }

00190 void EaglePlan_prepareBuffers(EaglePlan *plan, int buffers)
00191 {
00192     int i;
00193     
00194     if(NULL == plan) {
00195         return;
00196     }
00197     
00198     plan->buffersNeeded = buffers;
00199     plan->bufferTypes = (EagleDataType*) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EaglePlan_prepareBuffers.1", sizeof(EagleDataType), plan->buffersNeeded);
00200     if(NULL == plan->bufferTypes) {
00201         return;
00202     }
00203     for(i = 0; i < plan->buffersNeeded; ++i) {
00204         plan->bufferTypes[i] = EagleDataTypeUnknown;
00205     }
